title: Jeremy Kyle's ex-wife searches for new nanny for kids after TV star moved in with the last one
text:
Jeremy Kyle and his ex-wife Carla Germaine (Photo: PA)   Thank you for subscribing!   
The ex-wife of TV’s Jeremy Kyle is searching for a new nanny for their three kids – after he fell in love with the last one. 
Carla Germaine, 41, was left reeling after it was revealed the ITV presenter had moved in with Vicky Burton. 
And last week Jeremy, 51, and Vicky, 35, went public when they were pictured enjoying a romantic break in Barbados. 
But Sunday People can reveal back home, Carla – Jeremy’s wife of 13 years – was looking for someone new to look after the children, aged 13, 11 and seven. New flame Vicky Buron in the Caribbean (Photo: The Mega Agency) Jeremy Kyle soaks up the Caribbean sun with new flame Vicky Buron (Photo: The Mega Agency) 
A source said: “It’s not been the easiest of times for Carla. She’s been trying to find a nanny who is right for her and the children. She is yet to find one she likes. 
“It has obviously been tough given everything that has been going on between Jeremy and Vicky. For years and years Vicky was in their lives to look after the children and now everything has turned on its head.” 
Jeremy and Vicky looked happy and relaxed as they stayed at his Caribbean bolthole. 
He has given her keys to the home and told her she can stay there as often as she wants. 
The source went on: “They will stay in Barbados as often as Jeremy’s filming allows. The island is their sanctuary and it’s a place they can be openly together. 
“They can enjoy themselves as a new couple in love rather than staying hidden away. He’s enjoying getting on with his new life.” 
Jeremy and Vicky were on board a catamaran in Barbados when they were spotted for the first time together since news broke of their relationship. Vicky Buron (Photo: The Mega Agency) 
Enjoying a dip in the sea and drinks with friends, the pair looked relaxed and happy. 
And Vicky is understood to have put her stamp on the Caribbean home by ­co-ordinating renovations at the ­property. After returning to the UK the couple told pals they had a great time and can’t wait to go back to Barbados. 
Jeremy later picked his three children up from the family home and enjoyed the weekend with them. 
The Sunday Mirror revealed last month how the TV star, famed for quizzing other people over their romantic entanglements, had fallen for Vicky. 
She became the family nanny almost a decade ago and often went to Barbados with Jeremy, Carla and the kids. 
Jeremy, who got divorced from Carla a year ago, also has a grown-up daughter – Harriet, 26 – from his first marriage to Kirsty Rowley. Like us on Facebook
